item.title: HUNDI & Crisp Sandwich
item.description: HUNDI & Crisp Sandwich February 14, 2024 / 7-8PM Join us for a special mix featuring the dynamic duo of Hundi & Crisp Sandwich, going back to back in celebration of our love. Together, we bring a shared passion for rhythmic beats, often exploring unconventional genre combinations and showcasing their love for uplifting brain teasers. All with a sprinkle of emotion, sensitivity, and an undeniable energy. Today’s show pays tribute to our bubble, inviting listeners into the vibrant world we’ve created.
